Goals

Teach My Students Not to be Scrubs

We don't want no scrubs...

Don't say "hey <name>"~ aka teaching how to act like a professional (when dealing with children, parents, directors, etc).

Workforce Development Courses

For the majority of my professional career as an educator I have taught, and administered tests for, the CDA course.
Explain a little about what this is, and why it is important. For example, you could say that doing so is important cuz local people need it ot work in the field.
It not only helps the students by allowing them to work with children but students often start with the non-credit CDA course, and then join program which helps school/program. (aka helps with recruitment)

Conference Presentations

I presented workshops to early childhood educators at the following conferences:

  • Capital Association for Young Children
  • Association for the Education of Young Children
  • Association for the Education of Young Children
  • Association for the Education of Young Children
